thread.title: Home minister Anitha felicitates woman cop who cleared traffic while holding her baby | Vijayawada News - The Times of India
thread.title_full: Home minister Anitha felicitates woman cop who cleared traffic while holding her baby | Vijayawada News - The Times of India

author: Samson Raj
title: Home minister Anitha felicitates woman cop who cleared traffic while holding her baby | Vijayawada News - The Times of India
text:
Rajahmundry: Home minister Vangalapudi Anitha felicitated lady constable Amudala Jaya Shanti, whose video of controlling the traffic at Samalkota while holding her baby for nearly an hour went viral recently, in Vijayawada on Thursday.
Tired of too many ads? go ad free now The minister personally called Jaya Shanti two days back and appreciated her dedication towards duty, adding that such acts will enhance the respect of the police department in the eyes of the public. Jaya Shanti met the home minister at her residence in Vijayawada on Thursday and had breakfast with her. Anitha enquired about the wellbeing of her family and played with her children for some time. She also interacted with other members of her family.
Top News Of The Day Jaya Shanti, currently posted at Rangampeta police station in East Godavari district, won the hearts of people across the state and country by showing dedication towards her job while also balancing her motherhood. She cleared a traffic jam while carrying her baby in her arms and ensured an ambulance passed through safely. She was returning home after completing her duty at the police station, she stepped in without hesitation even though the area did not come under her jurisdiction and it was not her duty hours, and cleared the traffic while holding her baby to make way for the ambulance. The video of her selfless act later went viral.
End of Article Follow Us On Social Media
